sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Health resort in the western part of the Czech Republic, between the Bavarian border [Oberpfalz] and the Kaiserwald [Císařský], 125 km (c. 75 miles) west of Prague, 75 km (c. 45 miles) east of Bayreuth. In the Carlsbad [Karlovy Vary] region of Bohemia, it became part of Czechoslovakia in 1918, hence of the Czech Republic in 1993.

div.head: Marienbad and Schenker
div.p: Following the death of Schenker's mother, Julia Schenker, on December 22, 1917, the Jewish mourner's prayer [kaddish] was arranged to be said for her in Marienbad (OJ 12/10, p. 830, January 19, 1918).
